document_data.name: Fatima abd Haji
document_data.mainbody: '''Fatima abd Haji''', born '''Fatima bint Badia''', was a [[human]] [[sa'luk]] who was kept captive by a [[noble efreeti]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Fatima was an attractive woman with tan skin and black hair. She wore blue clothes and several pieces of jewelry, including a large pair of earrings, several bracelets and armbands, and a tiara.
document_data.History: She once attempted to rob the cave of the noble efreeti [[Haji]], but was caught. As punishment, Haji imprisoned her by forcing her to wear a cursed bracelet that would magically return her to his cave if she wandered too far.
